arguments.name: justClear
arguments.description: Just clear history for the current user, without actually removing messages for every chat user

arguments.name: revoke
arguments.description: Whether to delete the message history for all chat participants

arguments.name: peer
arguments.description: User or chat, communication history of which will be deleted

throws.description: The provided chat id is invalid
throws.name: CHAT_ID_INVALID

throws.description: The provided message id is invalid
throws.name: MESSAGE_ID_INVALID

throws.description: The provided peer id is invalid
throws.name: PEER_ID_INVALID
